inclusion.criterion: On broad spectrum antibiotics (Zosyn and/or Ciprofloxacin)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Mental capacity (able to give informed written consent).
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Passed prophylactic window (>48 hours on broad spectrum antibiotics)
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Unable to take PO at the time of evaluation for study entry
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: No more than 14 days of broad spectrum antibiotics anticipated
exclusion.label: met

notes: Patient is a 55yo woman with h/o ESRD on HD and peritoneal dialysis who presented with watery, non bloody diarrhea and weakness. She has a history of 2 prior C diff infections, the most recent just 1 month ago.
